text: Selma Blair (b. June 23, 1972) is an American actress. She acts in a variety of movie genres. She played Cecile Caldwell in the movie Cruel Intentions. She played Vivian in Legally Blonde. Blair was born in Southfield, Michigan. In October 2018, Blair revealed that she had been diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:People with multiple sclerosis Category:1972 births Category:Living people
title: Selma Blair
